title: Mushroom Spear
summaries: The Mushroom Spear is a Hardmode spear that can be purchased from the Truffle for 70 after at least one of the mechanical bosses has been defeated. When used, it will extend the reach of the spear by summoning seven spinning mushroom projectiles that hang in midair, deal 33.33*1/3 (33.33%) of the spear's base damage, and do not inflict any knockback.
Its best modifier is Godly or Demonic. Both modifiers increase the average damage output by the same amount.
